https://tmrev.io/movie/454309-Aim 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vxtzdykWYSjxKNIYRsUjQZKQNtl.jpg Western-found footage, manipulated to the point of being unable to convey a plot: an armed robbery is prevented through the camera, which brings one figure into a grotesque conflict. The armed confrontation gets stuck in a pounding staccato, while the public - although enbedded in the narration - remains disinformed. Aim
